arts.ttl: Matchday 11 concludes with Inter vs. Lazio
arts.sum: Lazio`s last win at San Siro, nerazzurri side, dated 30 March 2019: 1-0 in Serie A, with the decisive goal from Milinkovic-Savic. The official head-to-head record between the two sides in Milan stands at 92 matches with 49 Inter wins (latest 2-0, in Coppa Italia 2024/25), 31 draws (latest 2-2 in last year`s Serie A) and 12 Lazio victories (latest 1-0, in Serie A 2018/19).

arts.ttl: Inter Milan vs Lazio – Predicted lineup and team news

The Nerazzurri have been in fine form on home soil, securing five straight victories at San Siro. arts.ttl: Inter Milan vs Lazio – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Inter Milan welcome Lazio to San Siro on Sunday as they prepare for their final Serie A fixture before the November international break. The Nerazzurri, currently sitting second in the Serie A table with 21 points from 10 matches. Lazio, meanwhile, have climbed to eighth place after an initial rocky period.
